name: @abx/order-service
description: Contains the exchange order related services

scripts.build-order-data: npm run swagger-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/order-data/tsoa.json && npm run routes-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/order-data/tsoa.json
scripts.build-order-gateway: npm run swagger-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/order-gateway/tsoa.json && npm run routes-gen -- -c ./src/service-wrappers/order-gateway/tsoa.json
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run build-order-data && npm run build-order-gateway && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --skipLibCheck
scripts.migrate-db: npm run build && NEW_RELIC_NO_CONFIG_FILE=true NODE_ENV=test NODE_PATH=dist node dist/migrations/index.js
scripts.build-image-from-tag: echo build image here using $VERSION env variable, set by travis
scripts.release-image-integration: echo push image to ECR here
scripts.build-image-order-data: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-data:$JIRA_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-data:latest -f packages/services/order/src/service-wrappers/order-data/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/order
scripts.build-image-order-gateway: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-gateway:$JIRA_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-gateway:latest -f packages/services/order/src/service-wrappers/order-gateway/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/order
scripts.build-image-order-settlement: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-settlement:$JIRA_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-settlement:latest -f packages/services/order/src/service-wrappers/order-settlement/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/order
scripts.build-image-order-matcher: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-matcher:$JIRA_IMAGE_TAG -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-matcher:latest -f packages/services/order/src/service-wrappers/order-matcher/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/order
scripts.build-base-image: cd ../../.. && docker build --build-arg NPM_TOKEN=$NPM_TOKEN -t $KINESIS_ECR_URL/kbe-services-order-base -f packages/services/order/Dockerfile . && cd packages/services/order
scripts.build-image-latest: npm run build-base-image && npm run build-image-order-data && npm run build-image-order-gateway && npm run build-image-order-settlement && npm run build-image-order-matcher
scripts.push-image: npm run push-image-order-data && npm run push-image-order-gateway && npm run push-image-order-settlement && npm run push-image-order-matcher
scripts.deploy-latest-integration:order-data: aws ecs update-service --service kbe-int-order-data-service-v2 --cluster kbe-int-cluster --region ap-southeast-2
scripts.deploy-latest-integration:order-gateway: aws ecs update-service --service kbe-int-order-gateway-service-v2 --cluster kbe-int-cluster --region ap-southeast-2
scripts.deploy-latest-integration:order-settleme: aws ecs update-service --service kbe-int-order-settlement-service-v2 --cluster kbe-int-cluster --region ap-southeast-2
scripts.deploy-latest-integration:order-matcher: aws ecs update-service --service kbe-int-order-matcher-service-v2 --cluster kbe-int-cluster --region ap-southeast-2
